  .pagination-left {
    text-align: left; }
  .pagination-margin-left {
    margin-left: 20px; }
  .pagination-inline-block {
    display: inline-block; }
  @media screen and (max-width: 719px) {
    .pagination {
      text-align: center; } }
  .pagination li {
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
    margin-right: 2px;
    margin-bottom: 2px;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none; }
    .pagination li:first-of-type:last-of-type {
      display: none; }
    .pagination li &gt; span {
      display: inline-block;
      background-color: black;
      cursor: pointer;
      padding: 8px;
      line-height: 1;
      border: 0; }
    .pagination li.active &gt; a, .pagination li:hover &gt; a, .pagination li.active &gt; span, .pagination li:hover &gt; span {
      background-color: black;
      color: #fff; }
    .pagination li:hover &gt; a span {
      background-color: black; }
  .pagination a {
    display: block;
    background: black;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 8px 10px;
    margin: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
    border: 0;
    line-height: 1; }
  .pagination li.prev &gt; a,
  .pagination li.next &gt; a {
    padding-top: 3px;
    padding-bottom: 4px; }
  .pagination li.prev &gt; span,
  .pagination li.next &gt; span,
  .pagination li.prev:hover &gt; span,
  .pagination li.next:hover &gt; span {
    padding-top: 4px;
    padding-bottom: 5px; }

      .section-starter-container .section-starter h2, .section-starter-container .section-starter h4 {

          color: #fff; } }
    .section-starter-container .section-starter h2 a,
    .section-starter-container .section-starter h2 span, .section-starter-container .section-starter h4 a,
    .section-starter-container .section-starter h4 span {
      padding: 0 7px; }
  @media screen and (max-width: 719px) {
    .section-starter-container .section-starter__links {
      padding: 15px;
      display: none; } }
  .section-starter-container .section-starter__links ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; }
  .section-starter-container .section-starter__links li {
    list-style-type: none;
    display: inline-block; }

    background-color: yellow;
    padding: 3px 7px;
    margin: 3px 1px;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1.6rem;
    line-height: normal; }

    background-clip: content-box;
    float: none; }
    .section-starter-container .section-starter__item &gt; div {
      padding: 25px; }
      @media screen and (max-width: 719px) {
        .section-starter-container .section-starter__item &gt; div {
          padding: 0; } }

  margin-bottom: 50px; }

      display: none; }

        display: block; } }

      flex: 0 0 170px; }

    background-color: #9f2929; }
.bricks-container__item--with-head &gt; a,

  padding-top: 32px;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative; }
  @media screen and (max-width: 1023px) {
    .bricks-container__item--with-head &gt; a,
    .bricks-container__item--with-head &gt; .outset {
      padding-top: 28px; } }

  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 1;
  overflow: hidden; }

    display: none; }

  text-decoration: underline; }

    text-decoration: underline; }
    .form form label a:hover {
      text-decoration: none; }

      display: inline-block;

      .form form label a.form-info [class*="icon"] {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 3px; }

  position: relative; }

    .form .has-tooltip {
      padding-right: 25px; } }
.form .tooltip {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 100%;
  margin-left: 10px;
  font-size: 2.4rem;
  color: #649A18; }

    .form .tooltip {
      margin-left: 0;
      left: auto;
      right: 0; } }

      margin: 0 0 10px 0; }
